scripts.install: pnpm install && pnpm --prefix frontend install && pnpm --prefix backend install && pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum install
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "HH,ETH,BE,FE,SOL" "pnpm eth:node" "tsx scripts/eth-deploy.ts" "pnpm dev:be" "pnpm dev:fe " "docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up -d solana-dev"
scripts.dev:solana: pnpm solana:start && sleep 15 && pnpm sol:inject-ngrok && pnpm dev:fe
scripts.build: pnpm compile && pnpm --prefix backend build && pnpm --prefix frontend build
scripts.clean: pnpm --prefix contracts clean && pnpm --prefix frontend clean && pnpm --prefix backend clean
